title: Special Edition No Bull Podcast Where Cigars & Meat Meet with La Flor Dominicana
itunes:title: Special Edition No Bull Podcast Where Cigars & Meat Meet with La Flor Dominicana
description:
Welcome to a very special Thursday night edition of The Cigar Authority live from above Two Guys Smoke Shop at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe. On this special episode we host the inaugural event of La Flor Dominicana Gourmet Smoke Sessions with the No Bull Podcast.

We will be  joined by Litto Gomez & Jonathan Carney from La Flor Dominicana we smoke an Andalusian Bull, learn how to cook a Tomahawk Steak and we debut the LFD Tomahawk with details on how to get this new release. Join us where Cigars & Meat Meet on this special edition of The Cigar Authority.

We have teamed up with 2GuysCigars.com to offer you ways to get the LFD Tomahawk. Just click https://www.2guyscigars.com/lfd-gourmet-smoke-sessions to find out how!

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
